definition: to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: Dog Day Moxibustion treatment can alleviate paroxysm of the asthma rat.
sentences.chinese: 三伏药物敷贴能缓解哮喘大鼠的发作。

sentences.english: There is only one pre-set applicator machine which enables speedy tool setup.
sentences.chinese: 仅存在一个预先设定的敷贴机，其能够迅速工具设置。

sentences.english: The tiles are backed by a high-temperature-resistant material on the nose and leading edges of the wings.
sentences.chinese: 这些面砖敷贴在用耐高温材料制成的机头和机翼前缘。

sentences.english: Objectve To observe the therapeutic effect for palmolantar warts with 90Sr.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察90锶敷贴治疗掌跖疣疗效。

sentences.english: Method Strontium 90 contact therapy was introduced among 26 infants with skin hemangiomas.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用90锶敷贴为26例小儿皮肤血管瘤治疗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Plaster-pressure at ear points is quite effective for childhood enuresis.
sentences.chinese: 结论耳穴敷贴治疗小儿遗尿症有较好疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of complex therapy of TCM application method on idiopathic facial palsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中药敷贴综合治疗特发性面神经麻痹的疗效。

sentences.english: Method In summer dog days, treat 96 cases with acupoint application.
sentences.chinese: 采用夏季三伏天穴位敷贴96例。

sentences.english: To discuss the scientific research of the plaster therapy from the aspect of health maintainence.
sentences.chinese: 从摄生防病的角度切磋药物敷贴疗法的科研思绪。

definition: to treat winter diseases in the summer (TCM)
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
